title: Machine Learning Market By Component, End-use, Size, Opportunities And Forecast, 2019 – 2026
excerpt: As per the research held by Acumen Research and Consulting, "the global Machine Learning market anticipated to exceed US$ 76.8 Bn by 2027, along with the projected CAGR of 40.1% from 2020 to 2027". The global Machine Learning market research report encompasses qualitative and quantitative data derived from the analysis by experts and research analysts in the respective industry verticals from valid sources with the help of primary and secondary research tools.
